# Copilot Instructions

<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. For more details, visit https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization#_use-a-githubcopilotinstructionsmd-file -->

## Project Overview
This is a Next.js personal homepage project with a sci-fi design theme using purple and pink colors.

## Design Guidelines
- Use sci-fi/cyberpunk design elements
- Primary color palette: purple and pink gradients
- Include neon/glow effects
- Use modern typography with futuristic feel
- Implement smooth animations and transitions
- Dark theme with vibrant accents
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling

## Tech Stack
- Next.js with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Modern React patterns and hooks

## Component Structure
- Follow component-based architecture
- Use TypeScript interfaces for props
- Implement responsive design
- Focus on accessibility and performance
